text:
On or around November 8th a Teams patch was released and ever since it was
released if installed or not Teams uninstalls on reboot for a few hundred
machines. We are still dealing with this issue and would like to know if anyone
else is experiencing this? 
Thank you, 
Sam Gallahan 
--
%2BZwC_HXm40m%3D-JBTpU5DKvJ06s3-e9YSQ%40mail.gmail.com

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] Teams Uninstalling itself
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from pkg4pkg@gmail.com. Learn why this is important
[https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
On or around November 8th a Teams patch was released and ever since it was
released if installed or not Teams uninstalls on reboot for a few hundred
machines.  We are still dealing with this issue and would like to know if anyone
else is experiencing this? 
Thank you, 
Sam Gallahan 
--
